New Records: Lane Thomas hit his first home run in a Cleveland uniform
Josh Naylor reached 100 RBI for the first time in his career
Gavin Williams completed a season-high seven innings
Key Match Events: Lane Thomas and Josh Naylor hit two-run home runs to give the Guardians a lead
Gavin Williams struck out seven and walked one
Jhonkensy Noel made a diving catch to curb a Royals rally
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Stephen Vogt said Lane Thomas has been swinging the bat well the last few games
Thomas said all he wants to do is contribute to Cleveland's success
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Stephen Vogt said it was nice to see Lane Thomas' home run and that it was big momentum for the team
Vogt also praised Jhonkensy Noel's diving catch
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland moved 4 1/2 games ahead of the Royals in the AL Central standings
The Guardians' magic number to clinch the division is at 22 with 24 games left
Cleveland's magic number to clinch a playoff spot is 16 over Boston
